00039 #ifndef AMP_amp_raw_thread_H
00040 #define AMP_amp_raw_thread_H
00041

00043 #include <amp/amp_thread.h>

00045 
00046 
00047 #if defined(AMP_USE_PTHREADS)
00048 #   include <pthread.h>
00049 #   include <stdint.h>
00050 #elif defined(AMP_USE_WINTHREADS)
00051 #   define WIN32_LEAN_AND_MEAN
00052 #   include <windows.h>
00053 #   if !defined(_WIN32_WINNT) || (_WIN32_WINNT < 0x0400) /* To support SwitchToThread function */
00054 #       error Windows version not supported.
00055 #   endif
00056 #else
00057 #   error Unsupported platform.
00058 #endif

00065     
00066     
00075     struct amp_native_thread_s {
00076 #if defined(AMP_USE_PTHREADS)
00077         pthread_t thread;
00078 #elif defined(AMP_USE_WINTHREADS)
00079         HANDLE thread_handle;
00080         DWORD thread_id;
00081 #else
00082 #   error Unsupported platform.        
00083 #endif
00084     };
00085     
00090     struct amp_raw_thread_s {
00091         amp_thread_func_t func;
00092         void *func_context;
00093         
00094         /* Reserved to store the allocator context and dealloc function to
00095          * store for automatic memory freeing when thread detaching is 
00096          * implemented.
00097          */
00098         uintptr_t reserved0;
00099         uintptr_t reserved1;
00100         
00101         struct amp_native_thread_s native_thread_description;
00102         
00110         int state;
00111     };
00112

00114

00120                               void *thread_func_context, 
00121                               amp_thread_func_t thread_func);

00127     int amp_raw_thread_join(amp_thread_t thread);
